verbose_text: At present, augmented transcriptional and/or translational levels of NG2 / CSPG4 have been disclosed in 34 solid tumour types (and their subvariants) XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR, and, in several of them, a certain diagnostic and/or prognostic connotation of the PG has been proposed.
